<!----> <meta itemprop="headline" content="我用 54000 分钟打造的后台系统模板，开源了！"> <meta itemprop="keywords" content="前端,Vue.js,前端框架"> <meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2025-06-03T10:03:40.000Z"> <meta itemprop="image" content="https://p1-jj.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-t2oaga2asx/gold-assets/icon/icon-128.png~tplv-t2oaga2asx-image.image"> <div itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><meta itemprop="name" content="琢磨先生TT"> <meta itemprop="url" content="https://juejin.cn/user/3104676569966872"></div> <div itemprop="publisher" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Organization"><meta itemprop="name" content="掘金"> <div itemprop="logo" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/ImageObject"><meta itemprop="url" content="https://p1-jj.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-t2oaga2asx/gold-assets/icon/icon-white-180.png~tplv-t2oaga2asx-image.image"> <meta itemprop="width" content="180"> <meta itemprop="height" content="180"></div></div> <h1 class="article-title" data-v-61fb5e44="">
            我用 54000 分钟打造的后台系统模板，开源了！
            <!----> <!----></h1> <div class="author-info-block block-hidden" data-v-61fb5e44=""><div class="author-info-box" data-v-61fb5e44=""><div class="author-name" data-v-61fb5e44=""><a href="/user/3104676569966872/posts" target="_blank" rel="" class="jj-link username username ellipsis" data-v-65b50b51="" data-v-292f6e48="" data-v-61fb5e44=""><span class="name" style="max-width:160px;" data-v-65b50b51="" data-v-292f6e48="">
    琢磨先生TT
  </span> <!----> <!----> <!----> </a></div> <div class="meta-box" data-v-61fb5e44=""><time datetime="2025-06-03T10:03:40.000Z" title="Tue Jun 03 2025 10:03:40 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)" class="time" data-v-61fb5e44="">
                    2025-06-03
                  </time> <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="read-icon" data-v-61fb5e44=""><path d="M7.90078 2.80078C4.49278 2.80078 1.74745 6.11672 0.800781 7.77469C1.74745 9.58339 4.49278 13.2008 7.90078 13.2008C11.3088 13.2008 14.0541 9.58339 15.0008 7.77469C14.0541 6.11672 11.3088 2.80078 7.90078 2.80078Z" stroke="currentColor" data-v-61fb5e44=""></path><circle cx="7.89922" cy="8.00078" r="2.2" stroke="currentColor" data-v-61fb5e44=""></circle></svg> <span class="views-count" data-v-61fb5e44="">
                    13,854
                  </span> <span class="read-time" data-v-61fb5e44=""><svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" data-v-61fb5e44=""><rect width="16" height="16" fill="none" data-v-61fb5e44=""></rect><circle cx="8" cy="8" r="5.65625" stroke="#8A919F" data-v-61fb5e44=""></circle><path d="M7.69141 5.18652V8.30924H10.8141" stroke="#8A919F" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" data-v-61fb5e44=""></path></svg>
                    阅读15分钟
                  </span> <!----></div></div> <div style="flex:1;" data-v-61fb5e44=""></div> <!----> <!----></div> <!----> <!----> <!----> <!----> <div id="article-root" itemprop="articleBody" class="main" data-v-61fb5e44=""><div class="article-viewer markdown-body result"><p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/3cf74a1da73045a8bad81a8404411592~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55Ci56Oo5YWI55SfVFQ=:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1755567416&amp;x-signature=vthnhLKGMj%2F8yCbK5OoJXnuxPrM%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>作为一名开发者，我发现传统系统在 用户体验 和 视觉设计 上不能完全满足需求。这让我开始思考，如何设计一款既精致美观又能提供顺畅操作体验的后台系统。</p>
<p>经过反复思考，我决定推出 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lingchen.kim%2Fart-design-pro" target="_blank" title="https://www.lingchen.kim/art-design-pro" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Art Design Pro</a> —— 它不仅融汇了先最新的技术，更秉持着对完美用户体验和视觉设计的追求。希望每一位使用它的你，都能在日常操作中感受到那份精心设计和细腻打磨。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-0">解决的问题</h2>
<p>视觉疲劳与乏味</p>
<p>长时间面对冷冰冰的界面，难免会让人感到疲惫。本模板力求通过精心设计的配色、排版和动效，让每一次点击、每一次滚动都像是一段美好的互动体验。</p>
<p>用户体验不佳</p>
<p>管理系统不仅要看得舒服，更要用得顺手。我希望通过简洁直观的布局和流畅自然的交互，让用户能迅速找到所需功能，享受到一种人性化的关怀。</p>
<p>重复造轮子，开发成本高</p>
<p>我都曾为从零开始设计一套完整的前端界面而头疼。这个模板提供了一整套经过反复打磨的 UI 组件和设计规范，让你可以快速搭建出既美观又实用的后台管理系统，从而有更多时间专注于业务创新。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">核心特色</h2>
<p>美学与实用并重</p>
<p>我相信技术和艺术可以并肩同行。模板采用了流行而不浮夸的设计风格，每一处细节都经过精心打磨，力求让界面既赏心悦目，又不会喧宾夺主，真正做到美学与实用的完美融合。</p>
<p>情感化的用户体验</p>
<p>每一个交互动效，每一处按钮反馈，都是为了让用户在操作时感受到温暖与人性化。我希望，使用这个模板时，你能体会到那种“界面在与你对话”的感觉，而不是冰冷的指令集合。</p>
<p>模块化、灵活定制</p>
<p>我提供了高度模块化的设计，各个组件都可以根据实际需求自由调整。无论是追求个性化定制，还是需要快速迭代开发，这个模板都能满足你的需求，让你轻松驾驭各种业务场景。</p>
<p>全响应式设计</p>
<p>我深知现代办公已经跨越了 PC 和移动设备。模板不仅适配各种屏幕尺寸，更通过精细的设计让不同设备下的用户都能获得一致而优质的体验。</p>
<p>拒绝过度封装</p>
<p>我坚持简洁和透明的原则，避免对系统进行过度封装。你可以轻松修改和扩展任意部分，无论是样式、组件还是功能，都可以根据项目需求进行快速定制，让开发过程更加自由高效。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">项目预览</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-3">项目地址</h3>
<p>演示地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lingchen.kim%2Fart-design-pro" target="_blank" title="https://www.lingchen.kim/art-design-pro" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">www.lingchen.kim/art-design-…</a></p>
<p>官方文档：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lingchen.kim%2Fart-design-pro%2Fdocs%2F" target="_blank" title="https://www.lingchen.kim/art-design-pro/docs/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">www.lingchen.kim/art-design-…</a></p>
<p>代码仓库：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FDaymychen%2Fart-design-pro" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/Daymychen/art-design-pro" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">github.com/Daymychen/a…</a></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-4">浅色模式</h3>
<p>主页仪表盘</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/c4ea045997014a74a9a065c934131c63~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55Ci56Oo5YWI55SfVFQ=:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1755567416&amp;x-signature=tlbIV0MqsU9zFkMWBc%2BKEmFW0is%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>

<h2 data-id="heading-6">项目指南</h2>
<p>功能</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/56ba3ebcb9114ab3a125ad2b72ac3907~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55Ci56Oo5YWI55SfVFQ=:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1755567416&amp;x-signature=8GnbX3GRJJEM%2BtVb6sfn8I7LqBs%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-7">下载源代码</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-bash" lang="bash">git <span class="hljs-built_in">clone</span> https://github.com/Daymychen/art-design-pro
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-8">启动项目</h3>
<p>本项目使用 pnpm 工具安装依赖，推荐使用 pnpm</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-csharp" lang="csharp">npm install -g pnpm
或
yarn <span class="hljs-keyword">global</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">add</span> pnpm
</code></pre>
<p>安装依赖</p>
<pre><code class="hljs">pnpm install
</code></pre>
<p>如果 pnpm install 安装失败，尝试使用下面的命令安装依赖</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css">pnpm install <span class="hljs-attr">--ignore-scripts</span>
</code></pre>
<p>启动项目</p>
<pre><code class="hljs">pnpm dev
</code></pre>
<p>项目启动后会自动打开浏览器运行，默认访问地址：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=http%3A%2F%2Flocalhost%3A3006%2F" target="_blank" title="http://localhost:3006/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">http://localhost:3006</a></p>
<p>如果你在启动项目遇到问题，官方文档社区按钮，加入社区，社区会帮助你解决问题。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-9">目录结构</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-less" lang="less">├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">src</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">api</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 接口请求</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">articleApi</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">menuApi</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">model</span>
│   │   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">articleModel</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">usersApi</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">App</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.vue</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 入口文件</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">assets</span>  <span class="hljs-comment">// 资源</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">fonts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 字体文件</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">DMSans</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.woff2</span>
│   │   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">Montserrat</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.woff2</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">icons</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 图标文件夹</span>
│   │   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">system</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 系统图标</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">img</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 图片目录</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">styles</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 全局样式</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">app</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">change</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">dark</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">el-dark</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">el-light</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">el-ui</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 优化 element plus 组件库默认样式</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">markdown</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">mixin</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// scss 混合宏（函数）</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">mobile</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">one-dark-pro</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">pages</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">reset</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">theme-animation</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">transition</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">tree</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span>
│   │   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">variables</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scss</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// scss 主题变量</span>
│   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">svg</span>
│   │       └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">loading</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">components</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 组件目录</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">core</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 系统组件目录</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">banners</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">base</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">cards</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">charts</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">forms</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">layouts</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">media</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">others</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">tables</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">text-effect</span>
│   │   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">views</span>
│   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">custom</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 用户组件目录</span>
│   │       └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">comment-widget</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">composables</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// hooks</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">useAuth</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 权限</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">useCeremony</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 礼花效果</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">useChart</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 图表</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">useCheckedColumns</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 表格列选择</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">useCommon</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 公共</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">useSystemInfo</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 系统信息</span>
│   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">useTheme</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 主题</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">config</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">assets</span>
│   │   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">images</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">festival</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 礼花配置</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">index</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>    <span class="hljs-comment">// 系统配置</span>
│   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">types</span>
│   │       └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">index</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">directives</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 自定义指令</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">highlight</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 代码高亮指令</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">index</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">permission</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 权限指令</span>
│   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">ripple</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 水波纹指令</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">enums</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">appEnum</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 公共枚举</span>
│   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">formEnum</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 表格枚举</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">env</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.d</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">language</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 多语言</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">index</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">locales</span>
│   │       ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">en</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.json</span>
│   │       └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">zh</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.json</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">main</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">mock</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">json</span>
│   │   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">chinaMap</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.json</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">temp</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">articleList</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">commentDetail</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">commentList</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">formData</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">upgradeLog</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 系统升级日志</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">plugins</span>
│   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">echarts</span>
│   │       └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">index</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">router</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">guards</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 路由钩子</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">afterEach</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">beforeEach</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">index</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">routes</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 路由配置文件，静态路由、动态路由</span>
│   │   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">asyncRoutes</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">staticRoutes</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">routesAlias</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 路由别名</span>
│   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">utils</span>
│   │       ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">menuToRouter</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │       ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">registerRoutes</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │       └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">utils</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">store</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// pinia </span>
│   │   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">index</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">modules</span>
│   │       ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">menu</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │       ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">setting</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │       ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">table</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │       ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">user</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   │       └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">worktab</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">types</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 类型定义</span>
│   ├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">utils</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 工具包</span>
│   └── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">views</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 页面</span>
├── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">tsconfig</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.json</span>
└── <span class="hljs-selector-tag">vite</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.config</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.ts</span>
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-10">新建页面</h3>
<p>在 src/views 下创建一个页面</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/0419bed8851943038c3f836e3274aff9~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55Ci56Oo5YWI55SfVFQ=:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1755567416&amp;x-signature=e3KiFm6So0NLOkYG64zDBvF37y4%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-xml" lang="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"page-content"</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h1</span>&gt;</span>test page<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h1</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p>tips：上面的例子中我们添加了一个页面，页面 class="page-content" 这个类名可以将盒子最小高度始终撑满屏幕剩余高度</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-11">路由注册</h3>
<p>页面创建完成后需要注册路由才能访问页面，配置文件路径：src/router/routes/asyncRoutes.ts</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-12">一级路由（一级菜单）：</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-yaml" lang="yaml"><span class="hljs-attr">export const asyncRoutes:</span> <span class="hljs-string">MenuListType[]</span> <span class="hljs-string">=</span> [
  {
    <span class="hljs-attr">id:</span> <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">path:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'/test/index'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">name:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'Test'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">component:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'/test/index'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">meta:</span> {
      <span class="hljs-attr">title:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'测试页'</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">keepAlive:</span> <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>
    }
  }
]
</code></pre>
<p>完成上面的步骤后就可以访问页面了</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/b252ce2f06d043e5b19e5cbf0e7851fe~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55Ci56Oo5YWI55SfVFQ=:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1755567416&amp;x-signature=9TouBQpx3KDx57o5xAZZpFutMQg%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-13">多级路由（多级菜单）：</h3>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/62cbea79715d4a5ca32bc932d0f24a5f~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55Ci56Oo5YWI55SfVFQ=:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1755567416&amp;x-signature=KXVTXvqeESHEedcbyCcZE%2F9BcE4%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-yaml" lang="yaml"><span class="hljs-attr">export const asyncRoutes:</span> <span class="hljs-string">MenuListType[]</span> <span class="hljs-string">=</span> [
  {
    <span class="hljs-attr">id:</span> <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">name:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'Form'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">path:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'/form'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">component:</span> <span class="hljs-string">RoutesAlias.Home</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">meta:</span> {
      <span class="hljs-attr">title:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'表单'</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">icon:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'&amp;#xe721;'</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">keepAlive:</span> <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">children:</span> [
      {
        <span class="hljs-attr">id:</span> <span class="hljs-number">11</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">path:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'basic'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">name:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'Basic'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">component:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'/form/basic'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">meta:</span> {
          <span class="hljs-attr">title:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'基础表单'</span>,
          <span class="hljs-attr">keepAlive:</span> <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>
        }
      },
      {
        <span class="hljs-attr">id:</span> <span class="hljs-number">12</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">path:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'step'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">name:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'Step'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">component:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'/form/step'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">meta:</span> {
          <span class="hljs-attr">title:</span> <span class="hljs-string">'分步表单'</span>,
          <span class="hljs-attr">keepAlive:</span> <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>
        }
      }
    ]
  }
]
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-14">静态路由配置：</h3>
<p>配置文件路径： src/router/routes/staticRoutes.ts</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript" lang="javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> <span class="hljs-attr">staticRoutes</span>: <span class="hljs-title class_">AppRouteRecordRaw</span>[] = [
  {
    <span class="hljs-attr">path</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'/test'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'Test'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">component</span>: <span class="hljs-function">() =&gt;</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">import</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'@views/test/index.vue'</span>),
    <span class="hljs-attr">meta</span>: { <span class="hljs-attr">title</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'测试页面'</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">isHideTab</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>, <span class="hljs-attr">setTheme</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span> }
  }
]
</code></pre>
<p>配置完成后你可以访问：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=http%3A%2F%2Flocalhost%3A3006%2F%23%2Ftest" target="_blank" title="http://localhost:3006/#/test" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">http://localhost:3006/#/test</a> 查看新建的页面，到这里静态路由注册完成。</p>
<p>tips：如果静态路由在动态路由表也配置了，需要把静态路由中的配置去除，因为动态路由会自动注册路由。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-15">主页配置</h3>
<p>修改 HOME_PAGE 属性，配置文件路径：src/router/routesAlias.ts</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-arduino" lang="arduino"><span class="hljs-comment">// 主页路由</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-type">const</span> HOME_PAGE = RoutesAlias.Dashboard
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-16">路由属性（菜单属性）</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-typescript" lang="typescript"><span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">type</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">MenuListType</span> = {
  <span class="hljs-attr">id</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">number</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">path</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">string</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 路由</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">string</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 组件名</span>
  component?: <span class="hljs-built_in">string</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 组件路径</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">meta</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">title</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">string</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 菜单名称</span>
    icon?: <span class="hljs-built_in">string</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 菜单图标</span>
    showBadge?: <span class="hljs-built_in">boolean</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 是否显示徽标</span>
    showTextBadge?: <span class="hljs-built_in">string</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 是否显示新徽标</span>
    isHide?: <span class="hljs-built_in">boolean</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 是否在菜单中隐藏</span>
    isHideTab?: <span class="hljs-built_in">boolean</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 是否在标签页中隐藏</span>
    link?: <span class="hljs-built_in">string</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 链接</span>
    isIframe?: <span class="hljs-built_in">boolean</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 是否是 iframe</span>
    <span class="hljs-attr">keepAlive</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">boolean</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 是否缓存</span>
    authList?: <span class="hljs-title class_">Array</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 可操作权限</span>
    isFirstLevel?: <span class="hljs-built_in">boolean</span> <span class="hljs-comment">// 是否为一级菜单（系统自动处理，不需要手动添加）</span>
    roles?: <span class="hljs-built_in">string</span>[] <span class="hljs-comment">// 角色</span>
  }
  children?: <span class="hljs-title class_">MenuListType</span>[] <span class="hljs-comment">// 子菜单</span>
}
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-17">路径别名用法</h3>
<p>系统定义了常用的文件夹路径，你使用这些路径别名就可以方便的导入图片等资源</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-scss" lang="scss">alias: {
  '@<span class="hljs-string">': fileURLToPath(new URL('</span>./src<span class="hljs-string">', import.meta.url)),
  '</span><span class="hljs-keyword">@views</span><span class="hljs-string">': resolvePath('</span>src/views<span class="hljs-string">'),
  '</span><span class="hljs-keyword">@imgs</span><span class="hljs-string">': resolvePath('</span>src/assets/img<span class="hljs-string">'),
  '</span><span class="hljs-keyword">@icons</span><span class="hljs-string">': resolvePath('</span>src/assets/icons<span class="hljs-string">'),
  '</span><span class="hljs-keyword">@utils</span><span class="hljs-string">': resolvePath('</span>src/utils<span class="hljs-string">'),
  '</span><span class="hljs-keyword">@stores</span><span class="hljs-string">': resolvePath('</span>src/store<span class="hljs-string">'),
  '</span><span class="hljs-keyword">@plugins</span><span class="hljs-string">': resolvePath('</span>src/plugins<span class="hljs-string">'),
  '</span><span class="hljs-keyword">@styles</span><span class="hljs-string">': resolvePath('</span>src/assets/styles<span class="hljs-string">')
}
</span></code></pre>
<p>使用示例：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript" lang="javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> imgUrl <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'@imgs/state/500.png'</span>
&lt;img src=<span class="hljs-string">"@imgs/state/500.png"</span> /&gt;
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-18">CSS 变量写法</h3>
<p>项目定义了一套完整的 CSS 变量，你可以使用这些变量来方便优雅的开发出颜值逆天的页面</p>
<p>文件路径：src/assets/styles/variables.scss</p>
<p>CSS 变量包括主题颜色、背景颜色、文字颜色、边框颜色、阴影、媒体查询（设备尺寸），这些变量能自适应 Light 跟 Dark 模式。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css">// 默认主题变量 ｜ Light 主题变量

<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:root</span> {
  // Theme <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-primary</span>: <span class="hljs-number">93</span>, <span class="hljs-number">135</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-secondary</span>: <span class="hljs-number">73</span>, <span class="hljs-number">190</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-error</span>: <span class="hljs-number">250</span>, <span class="hljs-number">137</span>, <span class="hljs-number">107</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-info</span>: <span class="hljs-number">83</span>, <span class="hljs-number">155</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-success</span>: <span class="hljs-number">19</span>, <span class="hljs-number">222</span>, <span class="hljs-number">185</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-warning</span>: <span class="hljs-number">255</span>, <span class="hljs-number">174</span>, <span class="hljs-number">31</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-danger</span>: <span class="hljs-number">255</span>, <span class="hljs-number">77</span>, <span class="hljs-number">79</span>;

  // Theme <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-primary</span>: <span class="hljs-number">236</span>, <span class="hljs-number">242</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-secondary</span>: <span class="hljs-number">232</span>, <span class="hljs-number">247</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-success</span>: <span class="hljs-number">230</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>, <span class="hljs-number">250</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-error</span>: <span class="hljs-number">253</span>, <span class="hljs-number">237</span>, <span class="hljs-number">232</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-info</span>: <span class="hljs-number">235</span>, <span class="hljs-number">243</span>, <span class="hljs-number">254</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-warning</span>: <span class="hljs-number">254</span>, <span class="hljs-number">245</span>, <span class="hljs-number">229</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-danger</span>: <span class="hljs-number">253</span>, <span class="hljs-number">237</span>, <span class="hljs-number">232</span>;

  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-hoverColor</span>: <span class="hljs-number">246</span>, <span class="hljs-number">249</span>, <span class="hljs-number">252</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-grey100</span>: <span class="hljs-number">242</span>, <span class="hljs-number">246</span>, <span class="hljs-number">250</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-grey200</span>: <span class="hljs-number">234</span>, <span class="hljs-number">239</span>, <span class="hljs-number">244</span>;

  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#ffffff</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-light</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f9f9f9</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-dark</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#1e2129</span>;

  // <span class="hljs-attribute">Background</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span> | Hover <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-muted</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#99a1b7</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-100</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f9f9f9</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-100-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">249</span>, <span class="hljs-number">249</span>, <span class="hljs-number">249</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-200</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f1f1f4</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-200-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">241</span>, <span class="hljs-number">241</span>, <span class="hljs-number">244</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-300</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#dbdfe9</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-300-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">219</span>, <span class="hljs-number">223</span>, <span class="hljs-number">233</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-400</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#c4cada</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-400-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">196</span>, <span class="hljs-number">202</span>, <span class="hljs-number">218</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-500</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#99a1b7</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-500-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">153</span>, <span class="hljs-number">161</span>, <span class="hljs-number">183</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-600</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#78829d</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-600-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">120</span>, <span class="hljs-number">130</span>, <span class="hljs-number">157</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-700</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#4b5675</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-700-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">75</span>, <span class="hljs-number">86</span>, <span class="hljs-number">117</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-800</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#252f4a</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-800-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">37</span>, <span class="hljs-number">47</span>, <span class="hljs-number">74</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-900</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#071437</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-900-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">7</span>, <span class="hljs-number">20</span>, <span class="hljs-number">55</span>;

  // Text <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-muted</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#99a1b7</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-100</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f9f9f9</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-200</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f1f1f4</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-300</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#dbdfe9</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-400</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#c4cada</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-500</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#99a1b7</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-600</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#78829d</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-700</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#4b5675</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-800</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#252f4a</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-900</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#071437</span>;

  // <span class="hljs-attribute">Border</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-border-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#eaebf1</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-border-dashed-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#dbdfe9</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-root-card-border-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f1f1f4</span>;

  // Shadow
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-box-shadow-xs</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.1rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.75rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.25rem</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.05</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-box-shadow-sm</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.1rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">1rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.25rem</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.05</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-box-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.5rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">1.5rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.5rem</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.075</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-box-shadow-lg</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">1rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">2rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">1rem</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.1</span>);

  // Root card box、shadow
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-root-card-box-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-number">3px</span> <span class="hljs-number">4px</span> <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.03</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-root-card-border-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f1f1f4</span>;

  // Theme <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#fafbfc</span>; // 最底部背景颜色
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-main-bg-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#ffffff</span>;
}

// Dark 主题变量
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">html</span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.dark</span> {
  // Theme <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-primary</span>: <span class="hljs-number">93</span>, <span class="hljs-number">135</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-secondary</span>: <span class="hljs-number">73</span>, <span class="hljs-number">190</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-error</span>: <span class="hljs-number">250</span>, <span class="hljs-number">137</span>, <span class="hljs-number">107</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-info</span>: <span class="hljs-number">83</span>, <span class="hljs-number">155</span>, <span class="hljs-number">255</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-success</span>: <span class="hljs-number">19</span>, <span class="hljs-number">222</span>, <span class="hljs-number">185</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-warning</span>: <span class="hljs-number">255</span>, <span class="hljs-number">174</span>, <span class="hljs-number">31</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-danger</span>: <span class="hljs-number">255</span>, <span class="hljs-number">77</span>, <span class="hljs-number">79</span>;

  // Theme <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-primary</span>: <span class="hljs-number">37</span>, <span class="hljs-number">54</span>, <span class="hljs-number">98</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-secondary</span>: <span class="hljs-number">28</span>, <span class="hljs-number">69</span>, <span class="hljs-number">93</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-success</span>: <span class="hljs-number">27</span>, <span class="hljs-number">60</span>, <span class="hljs-number">72</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-error</span>: <span class="hljs-number">75</span>, <span class="hljs-number">49</span>, <span class="hljs-number">61</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-info</span>: <span class="hljs-number">34</span>, <span class="hljs-number">54</span>, <span class="hljs-number">98</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-warning</span>: <span class="hljs-number">77</span>, <span class="hljs-number">58</span>, <span class="hljs-number">42</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-danger</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100</span>, <span class="hljs-number">49</span>, <span class="hljs-number">61</span>;

  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-hoverColor</span>: <span class="hljs-number">51</span>, <span class="hljs-number">63</span>, <span class="hljs-number">85</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-grey100</span>: <span class="hljs-number">51</span>, <span class="hljs-number">63</span>, <span class="hljs-number">85</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-grey200</span>: <span class="hljs-number">70</span>, <span class="hljs-number">86</span>, <span class="hljs-number">112</span>;

  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#000000</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-light</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#1b1c22</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-dark</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#272a34</span>;

  // <span class="hljs-attribute">Background</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span> | Hover <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-muted</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#636674</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-100</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#1b1c22</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-100-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">27</span>, <span class="hljs-number">28</span>, <span class="hljs-number">34</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-200</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#26272f</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-200-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">38</span>, <span class="hljs-number">39</span>, <span class="hljs-number">47</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-300</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#363843</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-300-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">54</span>, <span class="hljs-number">56</span>, <span class="hljs-number">67</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-400</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#464852</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-400-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">70</span>, <span class="hljs-number">72</span>, <span class="hljs-number">82</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-500</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#636674</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-500-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">99</span>, <span class="hljs-number">102</span>, <span class="hljs-number">116</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-600</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#808290</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-600-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">128</span>, <span class="hljs-number">130</span>, <span class="hljs-number">144</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-700</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#9a9cae</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-700-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">154</span>, <span class="hljs-number">156</span>, <span class="hljs-number">174</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-800</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#b5b7c8</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-800-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">181</span>, <span class="hljs-number">183</span>, <span class="hljs-number">200</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-900</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f5f5f5</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-gray-900-rgb</span>: <span class="hljs-number">245</span>, <span class="hljs-number">245</span>, <span class="hljs-number">245</span>;

  // Text <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-muted</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#636674</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-100</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#1b1c22</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-200</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#26272f</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-300</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#363843</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-400</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#464852</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-500</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#636674</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-600</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#808290</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-700</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#9a9cae</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-800</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#b5b7c8</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-text-gray-900</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#f5f5f5</span>;

  // <span class="hljs-attribute">Border</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-border-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#26272f</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-border-dashed-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#363843</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-root-card-border-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#1e2027</span>;

  // Shadow
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-box-shadow-xs</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.1rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.75rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.25rem</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.05</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-box-shadow-sm</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.1rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">1rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.25rem</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.05</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-box-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.5rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">1.5rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">0.5rem</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.075</span>);
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-box-shadow-lg</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span> <span class="hljs-number">1rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">2rem</span> <span class="hljs-number">1rem</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.1</span>);

  // Root card box、shadow
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-root-card-box-shadow</span>: none;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-root-card-border-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#1e2027</span>;

  // Theme <span class="hljs-attribute">background</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-bg-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#070707</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-main-bg-color</span>: <span class="hljs-number">#161618</span>;
}

// CSS 全局变量
<span class="hljs-selector-pseudo">:root</span> {
  <span class="hljs-attr">--console-margin</span>: <span class="hljs-number">20px</span>; // 工作台盒子间距
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-card-border</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--art-gray-<span class="hljs-number">300</span>-rgb), <span class="hljs-number">0.6</span>); // 卡片边框颜色
  <span class="hljs-attr">--art-card-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-number">4px</span> <span class="hljs-number">0px</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0.04</span>); // 卡片阴影
}

// 媒体查询-设备尺寸
// notebook
$device-notebook: <span class="hljs-number">1600px</span>;
// ipad pro
$device-ipad-pro: <span class="hljs-number">1180px</span>;
// ipad
$device-ipad: <span class="hljs-number">800px</span>;
// ipad-竖屏
$device-ipad-vertical: <span class="hljs-number">900px</span>;
// mobile
$device-phone: <span class="hljs-number">500px</span>;
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-19">使用示例：</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css"># 文字
<span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--art-gray-<span class="hljs-number">100</span>);
<span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--art-gray-<span class="hljs-number">900</span>);

# 边框
<span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1px</span> solid <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--art-border-color);
<span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1px</span> solid <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--art-border-dashed-color);

# 背景颜色（白色｜黑色）
<span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--art-main-bg-color);

# 阴影
<span class="hljs-attribute">box-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--art-box-shadow);
<span class="hljs-attribute">box-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--art-box-shadow-xs);
<span class="hljs-attribute">box-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--art-box-shadow-sm);
<span class="hljs-attribute">box-shadow</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--art-box-shadow-lg);
</code></pre>
<p>如果你觉得颜色太深可以使用 -rgb 的变量结合 rgba() 来调整</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css"><span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--art-gray-<span class="hljs-number">800</span>-rgb), <span class="hljs-number">0.6</span>);
</code></pre>
<p>主题色</p>
<p>你可以通过 var(--main-color) 使用不透明的主题主色。同时，也提供了 9 个不同透明度等级的主题色变量，方便在不同场景中灵活应用：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css"># 不透明的主色
<span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--main-color);

# 具有不同透明度的主题背景色
<span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--el-color-primary-light-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>); # 最深
<span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">var</span>(--el-color-primary-light-<span class="hljs-number">9</span>); # 最浅
</code></pre>
<p>tips：--el-color-primary-light-1 到 --el-color-primary-light-9 分别代表从深到浅的九级亮色，适合用于悬浮态、边框、背景等场景。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-20">unplugin 自动导入</h3>
<p>项目已集成自动导入配置，无需手动导入 Vue API、Element Plus 组件及系统通用组件，使用时可直接书写，开发更高效。</p>
<p>你不再需要这样：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript" lang="javascript"><span class="hljs-comment">// demo1: Vue API</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> { ref } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'vue'</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> count = <span class="hljs-title function_">ref</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>)

<span class="hljs-comment">// demo2: Element Plus 组件</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> { <span class="hljs-title class_">ElButton</span> } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'element-plus'</span>
&lt;<span class="hljs-title class_">ElButton</span>&gt;按钮&lt;/<span class="hljs-title class_">ElButton</span>&gt;

<span class="hljs-comment">// demo3: 系统组件</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> <span class="hljs-title class_">Logo</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">'components/Logo'</span>
&lt;<span class="hljs-title class_">Logo</span> /&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>现在你只需这样：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-csharp" lang="csharp"><span class="hljs-comment">// demo1: Vue API</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> count = <span class="hljs-keyword">ref</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>)

<span class="hljs-comment">// demo2: Element Plus 组件</span>
&lt;ElButton&gt;按钮&lt;/ElButton&gt;

<span class="hljs-comment">// demo3: 系统组件</span>
&lt;Logo /&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>说明：由 unplugin-auto-import 与 unplugin-vue-components 自动完成引入操作，支持类型提示，支持 Tree-shaking，无需担心性能问题。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-21">Element Plus 组件库</h3>
<p>官网：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Felement-plus.org%2Fzh-CN%2F" target="_blank" title="https://element-plus.org/zh-CN/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">element-plus.org/zh-CN/</a></p>
<p>本项目基于 Element Plus 组件库构建，并在视觉设计与用户体验方面进行了特殊优化，进一步提升了整体界面效果与交互体验。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-22">iconfont 图标库</h3>
<p>项目图标使用 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iconfont.cn%2F" target="_blank" title="https://www.iconfont.cn/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">iconfont</a> 提供，内置了 600+ 的图标，可以满足大部分的图标需求。</p>
<p>如果你需要添加或者自定义图标库，可以访问这个链接 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iconfont.cn%2Finvite%3Ftype%3Dproject%26token%3DqJ9MeCACOXArp2g2%23%25E9%2582%2580%25E8%25AF%25B7%25E4%25BD%25A0%25E5%258A%25A0%25E5%2585%25A5" target="_blank" title="https://www.iconfont.cn/invite?type=project&amp;token=qJ9MeCACOXArp2g2#%E9%82%80%E8%AF%B7%E4%BD%A0%E5%8A%A0%E5%85%A5" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">系统图标库</a> ，进入后你可以把它添加到自己的项目中进行使用。</p>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/7f76644cbe704234a6f0ebef0af235b0~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55Ci56Oo5YWI55SfVFQ=:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1755567416&amp;x-signature=JoF1%2BkdA3Llm%2BGuU7td1dhNAC7M%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>使用方式</p>
<p>你可以在菜单中找到 Icon 图标，里面汇集了所有的图标，点击复制可以拿到图标的 Unicode 或 Font class。</p>
<p>Unicode 用法</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ini" lang="ini">&lt;i <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"iconfont-sys"</span>&gt;&amp;<span class="hljs-comment">#xe649;&lt;/i&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<p>Font class 用法</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ini" lang="ini">&lt;i <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"iconfont-sys iconsys-gou"</span>&gt;&lt;/i&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>图标库目录：src/assets/icons/system</p>
<p>注意：为了方便用户拓展图标库，系统图默认使用 iconfont-sys 类名，而不是 iconfont</p>
<p>图标库链接过期：请点击 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lingchen.kim%2Fart-design-pro%2Fdocs%2F" target="_blank" title="https://www.lingchen.kim/art-design-pro/docs/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">官网</a> 顶部社区按钮，进入 QQ 群 @群主或者管理员更换链接</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-23">环境变量</h3>
<p>说明</p>
<p>环境变量位于项目根目录下 .env、.env.development、.env.production</p>
<p>.env</p>
<ul>
<li>作用：适用于所有环境，里面定义的变量会在任何环境下都能访问。</li>
<li>用法：一般放置一些通用的配置，比如 API 基础地址、应用名称等。</li>
</ul>
<p>.env.development</p>
<ul>
<li>作用：仅适用于开发环境。当你运行 pnpm dev 时，Vue 会加载这个文件中的环境变量。</li>
<li>用法：适合放置开发阶段的配置，比如本地 API 地址、调试设置等。</li>
</ul>
<p>.env.production</p>
<ul>
<li>作用：仅适用于生产环境。当你运行 pnpm build 时，Vue 会加载这个文件中的环境变量。</li>
<li>用法：适合放置生产阶段的配置，比如生产 API 地址、禁用调试模式等。</li>
</ul>
<p>自定义环境变量</p>
<p>自定义环境变量以 VITE_ 开头，比如：VITE_PROT</p>
<p>你可以在项目代码中这样访问它们</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-arduino" lang="arduino">console.<span class="hljs-built_in">log</span>(<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span>.meta.env.VITE_PROT);
</code></pre>
<p>.env</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ini" lang="ini"><span class="hljs-comment"># 【通用】环境变量</span>

<span class="hljs-comment">#  版本号</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_VERSION</span> = <span class="hljs-number">2.2</span>.<span class="hljs-number">86</span>
<span class="hljs-comment"># 端口号</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_PORT</span> = <span class="hljs-number">3006</span>

<span class="hljs-comment"># 网站地址前缀</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_BASE_URL</span> = /art-design-pro/

<span class="hljs-comment"># API 地址前缀</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_API_URL</span> = https://m1.apifoxmock.com/m1/<span class="hljs-number">6400575</span>-<span class="hljs-number">6097373</span>-default

<span class="hljs-comment"># 权限模式（ frontend ｜ backend ）</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_ACCESS_MODE</span> = frontend

<span class="hljs-comment"># 是否打开路由信息</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_OPEN_ROUTE_INFO</span> = <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>

<span class="hljs-comment"># 锁屏加密密钥</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_LOCK_ENCRYPT_KEY</span> = jfsfjk1938jfj
</code></pre>
<p>.env.development</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ini" lang="ini"><span class="hljs-comment"># 【开发】环境变量</span>

<span class="hljs-comment"># 网站地址前缀</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_BASE_URL</span> = /

<span class="hljs-comment"># API 地址前缀</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_API_URL</span> = https://m1.apifoxmock.com/m1/<span class="hljs-number">6400575</span>-<span class="hljs-number">6097373</span>-default

<span class="hljs-comment"># Delete console</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_DROP_CONSOLE</span> = <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
</code></pre>
<p>.env.production</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ini" lang="ini"><span class="hljs-comment"># 【生产】环境变量</span>

<span class="hljs-comment"># 网站地址前缀</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_BASE_URL</span> = /art-design-pro/

<span class="hljs-comment"># API 地址前缀</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_API_URL</span> = https://m1.apifoxmock.com/m1/<span class="hljs-number">6400575</span>-<span class="hljs-number">6097373</span>-default

<span class="hljs-comment"># Delete console</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_DROP_CONSOLE</span> = <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-24">组件封装</h3>
<p>为提高项目结构的可维护性与组件复用性，组件应按功能分类存放：</p>
<ul>
<li>@/components/custom：自定义业务组件目录 供开发者根据业务需求封装的组件，适用于项目中具体场景的复用组件。</li>
<li>@/components/core：系统核心组件目录 包含系统级通用组件，例如布局容器、主题切换、菜单等，具备高度通用性与系统依赖性。</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-id="heading-25">系统Logo</h3>
<p>系统 Logo 采用图片形式展示，如需更换 Logo，仅需修改图片资源路径，无需改动组件逻辑。</p>
<p>配置文件路径：src/components/core/base/ArtLogo.vue</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-xml" lang="xml"><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"art-logo"</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">img</span> <span class="hljs-attr">:style</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"logoStyle"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">src</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"@imgs/common/logo.png"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">alt</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"logo"</span> /&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span>&gt;</span>
<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">template</span>&gt;</span>
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-26">系统名称</h3>
<p>系统名称统一通过配置文件管理，如需更改，只需修改 systemInfo.name 属性即可实现全局替换。</p>
<p>配置文件路径：src/config/index.ts</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css">const appConfig: SystemConfig = {
  systemInfo: {
    name: <span class="hljs-string">'Art Design Pro'</span> // 系统名称
  }
}
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-27">多语言</h3>
<p>项目使用 vue-i18n 插件，目前集成了 中文 和 英文 两种语言。 目前对菜单、顶栏、设置中心等组件进行了国际化，其他地方根据需求自行配置。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-arduino" lang="arduino">├── language
│   ├── index.ts      <span class="hljs-comment">// 配置文件</span>
│   └── locales       <span class="hljs-comment">// 语言包目录</span>
│       ├── zh.json   <span class="hljs-comment">// 中文包</span>
│       └── en.json   <span class="hljs-comment">// 英文包</span>
</code></pre>
<p>在模版中使用</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-bash" lang="bash">&lt;p&gt;{{ <span class="hljs-variable">$t</span>(<span class="hljs-string">'setting.color.title'</span>) }}&lt;/p&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>如何获取当前语言</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript" lang="javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> { useI18n } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"vue-i18n"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> { locale } = <span class="hljs-title function_">useI18n</span>();
</code></pre>
<p>如何配置多语言</p>
<p>修改 src/language/index.ts 在 messages 中增加你要的配置的语言，然后在 language 目录新建一个文件，如 en.ts</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-javascript" lang="javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> { createI18n } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"vue-i18n"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> en <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"./en"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> zh <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"./zh"</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">import</span> { <span class="hljs-title class_">LanguageEnum</span> } <span class="hljs-keyword">from</span> <span class="hljs-string">"@/enums/appEnum"</span>;

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> lang = <span class="hljs-title function_">createI18n</span>({
  <span class="hljs-attr">locale</span>: <span class="hljs-title class_">LanguageEnum</span>.<span class="hljs-property">ZH</span>, <span class="hljs-comment">// 设置语言类型</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">legacy</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>, <span class="hljs-comment">// 如果要支持compositionAPI，此项必须设置为false;</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">globalInjection</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>, <span class="hljs-comment">// 全局注册$t方法</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">fallbackLocale</span>: <span class="hljs-title class_">LanguageEnum</span>.<span class="hljs-property">ZH</span>, <span class="hljs-comment">// 设置备用语言</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">messages</span>: {
    en,
    zh,
  },
});

<span class="hljs-keyword">export</span> <span class="hljs-keyword">default</span> lang;
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-28">权限</h3>
<p>参考官方文档：<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lingchen.kim%2Fart-design-pro%2Fdocs%2Fguide%2Fin-depth%2Fpermission.html" target="_blank" title="https://www.lingchen.kim/art-design-pro/docs/guide/in-depth/permission.html" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">www.lingchen.kim/art-design-…</a></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-29">git提交</h3>
<p>代码提交校验与格式化：</p>
<p>使用 ESLint、Prettier、Stylelint 等工具，配合 Husky、Lint-staged，实现代码提交时的自动校验与格式化，规范团队开发流程。</p>
<p>代码提交规范化：</p>
<p>使用 CommitLint、cz-git 等工具，规范 Git 提交信息，提升项目的可维护性和协作效率。</p>
<p>自动化</p>
<p>代码提交会自动执行配置好的文件，自动完成代码校验、和格式。位于 package.json 中配置。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-json" lang="json"><span class="hljs-attr">"lint-staged"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"*.{js,ts}"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"eslint --fix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"prettier --write"</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"*.{cjs,json}"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"prettier --write"</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"*.{vue,html}"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"eslint --fix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"prettier --write"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"stylelint --fix"</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"*.{scss,css}"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"stylelint --fix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"prettier --write"</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"*.md"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span>
    <span class="hljs-string">"prettier --write"</span>
  <span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
<p>提交规范</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-arduino" lang="arduino">feat, <span class="hljs-comment">// 新增功能</span>
fix, <span class="hljs-comment">// 修复缺陷</span>
docs, <span class="hljs-comment">// 文档变更</span>
style, <span class="hljs-comment">// 代码格式（不影响功能，例如空格、分号等格式修正）</span>
refactor, <span class="hljs-comment">// 代码重构（不包括 bug 修复、功能新增）</span>
perf, <span class="hljs-comment">// 性能优化</span>
test, <span class="hljs-comment">// 添加疏漏测试或已有测试改动</span>
build, <span class="hljs-comment">// 构建流程、外部依赖变更（如升级 npm 包、修改 webpack 配置等）</span>
ci, <span class="hljs-comment">// 修改 CI 配置、脚本</span>
revert, <span class="hljs-comment">// 回滚 commit</span>
chore, <span class="hljs-comment">// 对构建过程或辅助工具和库的更改（不影响源文件、测试用例）</span>
wip <span class="hljs-comment">// 对构建过程或辅助工具和库的更改（不影响源文件、测试用例）</span>
</code></pre>
<p>提交代码</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-sql" lang="sql">git <span class="hljs-keyword">add</span> .
pnpm <span class="hljs-keyword">commit</span>

...

git push
</code></pre>
<p><img src="https://p9-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/205b078792464f6b989ba122d5a67cb8~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg55Ci56Oo5YWI55SfVFQ=:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1755567416&amp;x-signature=%2Bi7FgBo68E1MYRWuC0DRkpeIIk4%3D" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-30">构建与部署</h3>
<p>打包</p>
<pre><code class="hljs">pnpm build
</code></pre>
<p>构建打包成功之后，会在根目录生成对应的应用下的 dist 文件夹，里面就是构建打包好的文件</p>
<p>部署</p>
<p>部署时可能会发现资源路径不对，只需要修改 .env.production 文件即可。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ini" lang="ini"><span class="hljs-comment"># 根据自己存放的静态资源路径来更改配置</span>
<span class="hljs-attr">VITE_BASE_URL</span> = /art-design-pro/
</code></pre>
<p>部署到非根目录</p>
<p>需要更改 .env.production 配置，把 VITE_BASE_URL 改成你存放项目的路径，比如:</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-ini" lang="ini"><span class="hljs-attr">VITE_BASE_URL</span> = /art-design-pro/
</code></pre>
<p>然后在 nginx 配置文件中配置</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-bash" lang="bash">server {
  location /art-design-pro {
    <span class="hljs-built_in">alias</span>  /usr/local/nginx/html/art-design-pro;
    index index.html index.htm;
  }
}
</code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-31">代码如何保持最新</h3>
<p>如果你在基于本项目进行开发，并希望后续持续同步开源仓库的更新，建议按以下方式配置和操作：</p>
<p>1、克隆代码源码</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-bash" lang="bash">git <span class="hljs-built_in">clone</span> https://github.com/Daymychen/art-design-pro
</code></pre>
<p>2、添加自己的 git 仓库作为远程源</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-csharp" lang="csharp"><span class="hljs-meta"># 添加远程源（up 为自定义名称，可自行更改）</span>
git remote <span class="hljs-keyword">add</span> up &lt;your-git-url&gt;
</code></pre>
<p>3、推送代码到你自己的仓库</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-perl" lang="perl"><span class="hljs-comment"># 将代码推送到你自己的 Git 仓库</span>
<span class="hljs-comment"># 注意：main 为分支名，请根据你的实际分支进行替换</span>
git <span class="hljs-keyword">push</span> up main
</code></pre>
<p>4、同步你自己仓库的最新代码（可选）</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-bash" lang="bash"><span class="hljs-comment"># 从你自己的远程仓库拉取更新</span>
git pull up main
</code></pre>
<p>5、同步开源项目的最新代码（推荐定期执行）</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css" lang="css"># 从开源仓库拉取最新代码（<span class="hljs-selector-tag">main</span> 为默认主分支，请按需修改）
git pull origin <span class="hljs-selector-tag">main</span>
</code></pre>
<p>注意：同步更新前建议先 git pull 拉取代码并处理冲突，确保本地变更不会被覆盖。合并后再推送到你的远程仓库。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-32">结语</h2>
<p>Art Design Pro 是一个将美学与实用性完美融合的 Vue 3 后台系统模板，旨在为开发者提供高效、优雅的开发体验。无论是精致的 UI 设计、流畅的交互体验，还是模块化的架构和灵活的定制能力，都体现了我们对细节的极致追求和对用户需求的深刻理解。希望这个开源项目能成为你快速构建高质量管理系统的得力助手，释放更多时间专注于业务创新。</p>
<p>感谢每一位使用和支持 Art Design Pro 的开发者！我们期待你的反馈和贡献，欢迎加入<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lingchen.kim%2Fart-design-pro%2Fdocs%2F" target="_blank" title="https://www.lingchen.kim/art-design-pro/docs/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">官方社区</a>，一起打造更出色的开发体验。立即开始，探索无限可能！</p>
<p><a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lingchen.kim%2Fart-design-pro" target="_blank" title="https://www.lingchen.kim/art-design-pro" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">立即体验 Art Design Pro</a> | <a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FDaymychen%2Fart-design-pro" target="_blank" title="https://github.com/Daymychen/art-design-pro" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">查看代码仓库</a></p></div></div>
